positive.review: After 900 hours.... I finally did it. I got every single damn fish! I like this game a lot it's a pretty cute idle fisher, although I wish for late-game there were some more updates in regards to mouse shop / potion spawn rate. I spent two weeks waiting for a Legendary Potion to spawn so I could have a chance at 100%ing this game. Two. Weeks. For three dollars this is more than worth it!

Pros: The character animations and customization are cute, and look really nice at the bottom of your screen.
Follows the idle game formula very well - not very automated in the beginning, but the more you upgrade the more automated it is
The fish are interesting and not just normal fish you can find in real life, and very fun to collect.
Very customizable with what you need at the time to focus- remove all the sounds or make the screen larger or smaller.

Cons: Hard to get some more difficult fish if you just let the game go unless you really upgrade the fishing strength, harder fish need you to press to help it and that's distracting you from other things you're doing.
It's very difficult to 100%, and may get frustrating after a while.
Not a lot of customization for the character, could add more things, but the price is so low I wouldn‚Äôt really expect that.

Rating: 8/10 

Full review video: https://youtu.be/K2p1p09A9Bo

This is a real cute and simple idle fishing game that mostly plays for itself. You do need to be a little bit more hands on with it in the beginning to be able to catch some of the rarer fish but once you spend some time with the game you can just leave it running in the back with limited intervention. 

I give the game a 6.5/10. If there was a bit more features i'd consider raising the score but it functions as a serviceable cosy and simple idle fishing game

love having this, the only gripe i have so far is needing to pay to go to a different location (example it's free to go to the lake and $100 to go to the beach) every single time i wanna change locations for quests. other than that, great lil idle game
Easy enough to just let it run and catch some fish. Will take quite a while to get all the achievements though
Nice little desktop idler to have sitting in the corner while you work. Only downside is that getting 100% requires a [i]lot[/i] of waiting and luck with no real interactivity in the late game.

This strikes a good balance between slow progression and passive progression. Once you pass the inital stage it becomes quite hands off. 
There is enough here to keep that dopamine flowing for a while
Nice game.... helps times go by faster when waiting to clock out from work....
Great little corner of the screen afk 'game' - simple enough mechanics and it's easy to just leave it running and interact with it at your own pace ~
Small game that only requires as much attention as you want to give it. Fun to mess around with for a little bit, leave on its own or grind the highest quality fish
amazing game to have not in the way, or take your full attention, while being highly addictive and fun
This is a really cute and cozy game. You can casually play it or leave it to do its thing. Definitely worth the price for all the content.
Cute little desktop game that's surprisingly additive, the fish designs in the later areas are really unique. The quest's and the shiny variant's are really nice additions to the game too.

It's a fun basic fishing idler. I keep mine always to the front while playing other games/youtube and just let it roll. There's depth if you want to customize or get every grade of every fish. You can also collect all the bobbers/cosmetics. The progression doesn't snowball but stays fairly consistent. You can unlock quests to chase certain fish and an extra shop that sells boosts you normally would have to wait for a random drop of. Overall fun and the custom fish species are pretty funny. If you like idlers it holds its own.
Idle game that doesn't presume to be anything more than something that can be part of a workday or even other games.
This has helped keep my sanity in my busy life, it has allowed me to hit that serotonin need for gaming while I work on other projects with a relaxing soundtrack. 10/10 will play again and again.
Fun game on the side and not overly distracting.
Perfect little game to mess with while reading manwha.
really good game with infinite gameplay keep updating this peak

this game is perfect for inpatient people so they can do something while waiting for some things
also i personally think that the idea of having a small game window in a corner is creative

The game has a cute art style, and is fun to play. Just wish there was a bit more nearing end game, I have about 300 hours, and from what I have seen its mostly just afking until you get the rest of the feesh which takes another 600 hours. Wish there was some more stuff to do in those 600 hours that I will afk waiting to catch all the fish for the achievements. 

Otherwise amazing game, art is super cute and I will be grinding for all the achievements.

A fun little game and very space efficient.
The value punches above its price point imo, had a great time grinding out all the achievments
Hopefully they'll add more little things to bring me back!
Its a very relaxing little game, super cute UwU
A cute idle fishing game that is great to use while working on stuff or general surfing the web :)

Nice little game to keep on the corner of your screen while playing something turn based. I do wish there was a clearer end to main progression. I know it is meant to be an idle game, but still, updates are maxed but no end in sight leaves a sad taste in my mouth.
Cute fun little game I got all achievements last fish was a long howl though!

Fsh
10/10 fidget toy.

Still keeping warm on the ende of my screen. Do need to re laucnh it every few days as it can start to lag a bit.

Hard to finish but very cozy to chip away at. I've seen other desktop toy games like this around, but I think this one has my favorite avatar customization and style for the fishing, and the fishing locations are varied and present a great fantasy, especially the last area!
cute little desktop toy game with a relaxing fishing theme to it. challenging to try and catch all of the fish.
Just a chill little fishy game that you leave on the corner of your screen whilst you do other activities. It's a great little game to pass the time.

A wonderful game for distraction with simple gameplay. The experience of meditative development and the subsequent completion of your fish catch log are completely worth the money. Honestly, it's just a cute little trinket for your desktop.

P.S.: My girlfriend and I bet that I couldn't muster enough social pressure to get her to go fishing for real. Please give some awards, likes, etc., for this review. I want to change her mind and take a break. Would you mind helping me? :)

You leave it on the desktop and come back to it every now and then.

What else are you expecting?
Good chill game, great for that autistic gen-z brain in constant need of a second or third thing to do 10/10

I'll be real, the only reason I've "played" this as much as I have is because my laptop started crashing a while ago and keeping this game running prevents it from crashing. It's small and cute little game that fits nicely in the corner of your screen and doesn't cause too much trouble, while doing pleasant idle fishing stuff. It's also incredibly cheap. Like, come on, three bucks for a cute little fishing buddy ain't bad.

So not only would I recommend it for regular game reasons, it's also got massive upsides for me personally and I will probably get a few thousand hours in it before long.
An excellent little game to have running in the background while you do other tasks. Is very simple but will take some time to get all of the achievements!

This game is one of the most relaxing games i have played.
In this game you just sit there fish and look pretty :3 the perfect relaxing game game. Though this game can get grindy in the late game when youre trying to catch every fish, tho that is to be expected.

10/10 would fish here again
It's a good day when I'm fishing, and with this game, I'm always fishing. Solid idle relaxation game.
very fish its all i think ab my wife says i should get a job but nah fishing is better, i might be served later im glad the goverment hasent outlawed fun yet

Great to have on the side while doing something. Semi-AFKer.
Enough of something else to do so you don't get bored, and not so distracting you avoid work by playing it.

Really good and relaxing side game. If you like having something on while you work/watch or do something this is perfect for that + fishing. Will take quite a big of time to 100% it but not way to much to complete every upgrade (haven't gotten all the rarity's of fish yet).
Simple fishing game to run in background. Nothing more nothing less.
Not particulalry interesting, but a fun little idle game to have on the side while you're doing other things.

It's not bad. It requires more attention than I would like for an 'idler' of this scope. 

There are cool fish to catch. There are cool cosmetic customizations for your fisher. There are tacklebox and equipment upgrades. 
BUT!
I play this during class and it's really nice. Just passive dopamine hits in the background of whatever you're doing. Its great
Nice and relaxing idle game to leave open on your desktop.

Awesome little desktop companion game! Great game to have open while working, studying, etc. Awesome visual style with variable weather, and plenty of different areas and fish to keep you entertained on the side. Overall fantastic little game. Totally worth the little amount that it costs!

I like this. It's relaxed and can be played while doing something else, good for keeping busy while watching something or to just have in the background with the occasional assistance to catch and sell. I've only played a little and there's so much to get. For $3, you get a lot in a little for very little. Do yourself a favor and grab it, full price, support the dev.

7-8/10

Honestly, how much more can you say about a small quiet game to run while you're doing stuff.

Of course it's great for when you need some little distractions (unless you turn those options off) and helps with little "hey, take a break" times as well.

amazing, wonderful, awesome,,,,,,,
300 hours in, i was already loving the game and then the dev pushed a update with fixes, more content and qol, actually listening to feedbacks
10 out of 10, buy it
Very cute and addictive despite being a supposedly passive game

Very chill fishing game :)
A bit frustrating to 100% but definitely worth the price to have a lil person fish while you mald

A very relaxing game where you can set an audio notification for when it needs your help and to get all the updates, you don't need to be present all the time (but it will take longer).

A good game overall for working or studying.
10/10 Really fun game to have on the side of your screen when doing other stuff

For a couple bucks you can get a little pond and a character to catch fish. It takes a bit to get it started but eventually you can set it up to alert you when there is a fish stronger than your auto reel can catch, and after that if going for 100% is your thing then all you gotta do is pick the location and the type of bait and keep on fishing. It's just a nice little thing you can have in the corner while you're working on other things, watching videos, or even playing another game. If you're a fan of having an Idle game active, this one is a nice choice that isn't too intrusive or too slow.
it is a very chill game with a lot of interesting progression

so small on my screen, so good for playing when working or when researching. progression is slow but i think that's a pretty good thing. i'm not too far in with 11 hours in already. wouldn't necessary call it an idle game because you can definitely miss stuff if afk, but i believe it gets better later on!
Wonderful fishing Idle game, well made, well executed, its great
this little pond idle is adorable, and it can fit when you're doing something else
Neat little game to chill in the corner of your screen as you draw
Cute little fishing idle game, though it was fairly boring to 100% due to how the fishing mechanic works.
Simple and satisfying idle game. I love the settings options and find the customization satisfying enough. I'd recommend this to any fan of simple idle games.

SUCH a fun little desktop toy. cornerpond can be played actively or left to idle--in fact you Should take at least a few minutes when you first set the game up for active play so that you can pick up upgrades for better idling--but whether you just want a little fisher on your desktop to look cute or you actively want something to click on to keep your hands busy while you watch or listen to things, this baby's got a good couple hundred hours in it if you're playing to collect all the chievos.

there are 6 environments each with their own unique array of fish to catch, which seem extremely normal (you've got a lake and a beach) until you head off for some arctic fishing in land 3, and... wait, is that some sort of santa on my line?! the further into the game you get the more fantastical and playful the fish designs get, to the point it's fun just looking through your tackle box to see what you caught in this play session. the fisher's animations are extremely satisfying and all the pixel art is adorable.

aside from simple fish species variety there are a variety of quality levels to catch everything at, as well as shinies and a few secrets for the real truck freaks. between upgrades and cosmetics to customize your funny little guy cornerpond is especially fun for anyone who likes games where the object is to Collect(tm). there are various consumable items to use for active/strategic gameplay, and options to turn off all the noises except for special fish alerts if you just want it to go full auto and you find the sfx distracting.

for the extremely low price point, cornerpond is a real............................................... Catch. big recommend if you like low maintenance fishing games or idlers with active play components.

W CHILL GAME

I was looking for something to put on my second monitor and this little game is a perfect fit. The paddlefish is my favorite one.
I love the chill vibe of fishing games, and idle games are always a great time. My only regret is not playing this sooner.

Best "bottom of screen" idle game I've tried--takes up very little screen space, is minimally distracting, but has enough clothing/accessory items that you can spend a couple minutes playing around when you need a mental break from work. Cute graphics, and an amazing array of wild and wacky fish. The only thing it needs to make it an A+ game is ambient background noise for the different locations. And maybe shirt sleeves. :P

ETA: Nominated this for the "your moment of chill" category in the 2025 Steam Awards.

I know there is quite a bit of character customization in it so far, would really like to see even more. Stuff like customizing fishing rods, having different shirts, jackets, shoes, etc. I'm a big advocate for customization on anything, so I think more would be great. Otherwise, this is my first on screen idle game and I really enjoy it a lot. Looking forward to unlocking more achievements and leveling everything up.

This game is honestly great.
Worth the price plus I like idle games and reminds me of Fisch
Pleasant gameplay loop during the period you have to upgrade stuff, afterwards an acceptable although (potentially depending on luck!) very slow and somewhat tedious 100% journey.

For an idle game, this one is pretty fun.  If you're a completionist, it's a little trickier, but for the price, it's well worth it.  It's a perfect desktop companion that sits in the corner while you're doing whatever you need to be doing.  The controls and settings are pretty easy and it's a slow enough progression to keep things interesting for a while.

Sick idea, make another 2 dollar or so game that's a fish tank on the other corner of the screen
Literally been playing this nonstop since I grabbed it, wonderful passive game!!! Would recommend

simple minigame, progression bit slow, micro-management on inventory (fish and bait)

good enough for its price, get it while its on discount

this game is literally the pinacle of subway surfers corner gameplay, its just a small corner of your screen that has a femboy fishing

only thing i want is more socks (stripped socks specially) and then it'd be truly the perfect femboy fishing game for everyone

jokes aside, 13.5/10 game, makes my brain go boing when i see a really hard to catch fish

very nice. fish are so cool.

sadly broke and i just get a black tab now but hey, got my hours in.

Cornerpond is a relaxed idle-fishing game that quietly runs while you do something else. The visuals are nice and the slow grind of catching fish, upgrading gear, and unlocking cosmetics feels satisfying without demanding much attention. It‚Äôs perfect for having running in the background while you stream videos, browse the web, or drink tea.
good desktop fishing  not very complex witch is good for somthing to just have on the side while doing stuff

its a neat game i play every now and then just to be able to work towards something while listening to a certain few friends i will not name talk about something such as warhammer 40k lore for over 3 hours straight without pausing to breathe
Great second screen distraction for those of us with adhd
Fish. Mini OSU. Idle. But not so idle because you need to help em when the shiny comes along. Other than that, pretty Idle.
Super helpful little companion when I'm working. Keeps me chilled out and isn't too distracting. Love all the creative fishies!

Let any fish who meets my gaze learn the true meaning of fear; for I am the harbinger of death. The bane of creatures sub-aqueous, my rod is true and unwavering as I cast into the aquatic abyss. A man, scorned by this uncaring Earth, finds solace in the sea. My only friend, the worm upon my hook. Wriggling, writhing, struggling to surmount the mortal pointlessness that permeates this barren world. I am alone. I am empty. And yet, I fish.
You turn your pc on, you start fishing while studying, occasional big fish makes you take a 10 second break. 10/10 recommended!

WOMEN FEAR ME
FISH FEAR ME
MEN TURN THEIR EYES
AWAY FROM ME
AS I WALK
NO BEAST DARE
MAKES A SOUND
IN MY PRESENCE
I AM ALONE ON
THIS BARREN EARTH
üêü
Best cornerpond game ever
I have died so many times in so many games because of this little game. And I'd happily do it again.
writing this review so i can get xp for play the game you nominated award.
I fish, I fish some more, And re-fill some bait to fish some more. Most realistic title I have ever played.
cletus, take the reel (take it from my hands) (cletus is the name of my pixel woman)
Sit back and enjoy fishing while you're doing other tasks!
i love this little cozy fishing game tihi very much lilly approved
cool concept for a idle game.
really addicting and really chill
Game is just fun idle fishing, great when working from home too.
As for me, it is better than clickers.
i'm cornerponding it ooohhhh i cornerpongin it sooo harrdd ohhhh i cornerponding iiiittttttttttt ohh yeaaaaaaaaaa
very cute and simple.

I'm no longer turning my PC off at night, thanks a lot

10/10 would recommend
Cozy little corner game.
small person fishing made me develop world dominating ambitions
Very cozy desktop idle game. Loving it.
chill and fish ... for a thousand hours if your really afk to 100% it

negative.review: Very cute game, but feels incomplete. any gameplay is EXTREMELY slow and limited compared to other games which sit on your screen. would love to see this updated so I could change my review

Game is very cute, but it also has issues with memory leaks and overall is just incredibly boring. If I wanted to look through cute pixel art I would browse a pixel artists twitter. There is no game. The upgrades don't do anything. Clicking circles is hectic and unfun. The circles always seem to play the jetsons theme song which is also pretty annoying. 

It's a cool demonstration of someones pixel art put into a game, but I feel like I've done literally everything in the game and then some and I still have half the achievements. It's just mostly been a hassle and not fun at all.

The one redeeming thing is the sounds are extremely satisfying, but again I didn't really buy a fidget toy. I wanted to fish.
fish

Less idle and more "Pay attention to me" type deal. No auto sell, no auto buy bait, you need to pay attention to it (Not terrible.. it is a game after all, But its a background game... add some QOL!) If you want to actively tab out of whatever your playing that is clearly far more interesting then this "Game" Sure.. its up your alley.. for me though, its something i have on the side while i drink and listen to music.

Game is very cute, but it also has issues with memory leaks and overall is just incredibly boring. If I wanted to look through cute pixel art I would browse a pixel artists twitter. There is no game. The upgrades don't do anything. Clicking circles is hectic and unfun. The circles always seem to play the jetsons theme song which is also pretty annoying. 

It's a cool demonstration of someones pixel art put into a game, but I feel like I've done literally everything in the game and then some and I still have half the achievements. It's just mostly been a hassle and not fun at all.

The one redeeming thing is the sounds are extremely satisfying, but again I didn't really buy a fidget toy. I wanted to fish.

an idle game that punishes you for not actively playing </3 

ive spent the last ~100 hours of game time going after the very last legendary fish i need, but it's SO rare and legendary potions just don't drop. on top of that even if everything is fully upgraded, you need to be fast enough with manually clicking to have a chance at catching it......... so you'll definitely miss it if it's just idle on the side LOL
Very cute game, but feels incomplete. any gameplay is EXTREMELY slow and limited compared to other games which sit on your screen. would love to see this updated so I could change my review
